name: Gary Gadget Building Boats (Swedish)
description:
Meet Gary Gadget and build your dream  boat, complete missions and collect other parts for your own master piece,  your friend will also come with parts for you sometimes. Explore the ocean and meet all of his friends!

You might need an emulator to install and play this game, ex. DosBox or VirtualBox. You can also use an old computer or older version of Windows, ex. XP, 7 or Vista. (Might work just fine with OS X)
